template&lt; std::sentinel_for&lt;Iter&gt; S &gt;

Compares a {{tt|move_iterator}} and a {{tt|move_sentinel}}.

{{cpp/enable if|{{c|1=i.base() == s.base()}} is well-formed and convertible to {{c/core|bool}}}}.
